description: Arrive at the airport and transfer to the hotel. Spend the evening relaxing or take a leisurely walk around the local area to get familiar with your surroundings.
Visit historic temples and immerse yourself in local culture. Later, enjoy a scenic river cruise, with stunning views of the surrounding landscapes.
Explore vibrant local markets where you can shop for traditional crafts, fresh produce, and souvenirs. Take in the sights, sounds, and smells of the marketplace.
Get your adrenaline pumping with exciting outdoor activities, such as hiking through lush trails, and experiencing thrilling river rafting or zip-lining.
After checking out of the hotel, transfer to the airport for your flight back home. Reflect on your unforgettable experiences from the trip.
